title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 196.5 - Appeal Officer's Report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 196.5 - Appeal Officer's Report

State Regulations
(a) The appeal
officer shall prepare a report and make recommendations to the commissioner. The recommendations may be in the form of a proposed decision which will
contain findings of fact and conclusions of law. This report, along with the
entire record, shall be transmitted to the commissioner, the counsel to the
department, and the business entity that filed the appeal. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
